headline: Is M&T Bank (MTB) Undervalued? Taking Stock After Recent Pullback
summary: M&T Bank (MTB) shares have seen a gradual pullback over the past month, with the stock declining around 5%. Investors may be weighing how recent results and shifting market sentiment will influence the bank’s outlook as it heads into the next quarter. See our latest analysis for M&T Bank. Shares have cooled off recently, but looking at the bigger picture, M&T Bank’s 1-year total shareholder return of nearly 10% shows the bank has still rewarded long-term investors even as short-term momentum...
